The address of the team member

params._communityMembers: An array of addresses for the community members
params._snx: The address of the SNX token
params._teamMembers: An array of addresses for the team members
params._toPass: The number of votes each proposal is required in order to execute

params._amount: The amount that the receiver will receive
params._receiver: The address to receive funds if proposal executes

removeCommunityMember(address,uint256[]).details: The caller can specify an array of proposals to have the member's vote removed

params._member: The address of the community member
params._proposals: The array of proposals to have the member's vote removed from

params._member: The address of the team member

params._proposal: The proposal number to vote on
params._vote: Boolean to indicate whether or not they approve of the proposal

voted(address,uint256).return: Boolean indicating if the address has voted

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Will not allow withdrawing balances locked in proposals

addCommunityMember(address).notice: Allows community members to be added as proposers and voters

addTeamMember(address).notice: Allows team members to be added

methods.constructor: Contract is created with an initial array of team and community members which will be stored in mappings

createProposal(address,uint256).notice: Called by proposers (team or community) to propose funding for an address. Emits NewProposal event.

deleteProposal(uint256).notice: Called by proposers to clean up storage and unlock funds. Emits DeleteProposal event.

removeCommunityMember(address,uint256[]).notice: Allows community members to be removed

removeTeamMember(address).notice: Allows team members to be removed

voteProposal(uint256,bool).notice: Called by proposers (team or community) to vote for a specified proposal. Emits VoteProposal event.

voted(address,uint256).notice: Checks to see whether an address has voted on a proposal

votingPhase(uint256).notice: Check to see whether a proposal is in the voting phase

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Called by team members to withdraw extra tokens in the contract

withdrawable().notice: Shows the balance of the contract which can be withdrawn by team members

userdoc.notice: This contract allows for grants to be proposed and voted on by community members and the Synthetix team. All proposals must receive at least one approving vote by a Synthetix member before funds will transfer.
